title: Unable to log in due to "Your account has transferred to another region" error
body:
On my main account (account name "chems1919", summoner name "spooky muider"), I am no longer able to log in. I have never attempted to change regions, I have run several anti-malware and anti-virus programs, etc. 

I just submitted a ticket but I wanted to make sure it went through successfully and is in queue to be worked (I did not see a ticket number).

Thank you!

replies.body: I've snipped out your account information to protect your privacy and account security.  I've confirmed that your ticket has been received and escalated to our account recovery team.  I recommend going over our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide for some really good safety practices in the meantime.  Hopefully, that gives some ease of mind.  Hang tight!
